title: EPISTOLA Robert Kennedy
html:
EPISTOLA Robert Kennedy

Re Jessy Randall's piece, I had always thought “Blah, Blah, Blah” was derived from “hablar” probably via Mexico—at least, “blah, blah” is fairly common here in Spain and with the usual meaning. Used by men about women blah, blah, blahing about children & family; by women about men blah-blahing about sports and politics.

Interesting if not vital.

[Robert Kennedy]
